name: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority
short: A service on AWS that allows users to create and manage their own private certificate authorities to set up secure network connections.
description: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority (ACM PCA) is a service that helps you easily and securely manage the lifecycle of your private certificates. ACM PCA provides you a highly-available private CA service without the upfront investment and on-going maintenance costs of operating your own infrastructure. It supports creating private certificate authority, issuing and revoking certificates, and auditing the certificate operation history, ensuring a secure and efficient certificate management.
